summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Sidekicks: A Dreamer and a Champion VHS Review Date: 2013/02/02 Store: Jonathan Brandis, Joe Piscopo, Chuck Norris, Mako, Beau Bridges (Actor) Rated: PG Format: VHS Tape Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Sony Pictures Home Entertainment, All Sony Pictures Titles Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.32 x 4.19 x 1.12 inches; 6.13 Ounces', 'Run time': '1 hour and 40 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 9, 2000', 'Date First Available': 'February 24, 2006', 'Actors': 'Jonathan Brandis, Joe Piscopo, Chuck Norris, Mako, Beau Bridges'} Review Text: OK - so you have an ADHD kid who zones out into day dreams about Chuck Norris!

What could be better?

As hilarious as I remembered it to be.

The real question is why hasn't this cult classic come out on DVD? Review Title: Phenomenal.... I mean - come on?! Henson', 'Janelle Monae', 'Kevin Costner']} Review Text: This movie rocks.... from start to finish!!
Girl Power at its best.
... and who knew how gorgeous Janelle Monae is and how she holds the screen. Review Title: Girl Power at its best.. Such an interesting story. Why ruin it with such horror?

I just dont need those images in my brain. Review Title: Extremely (and I mean extremely) VIOLENT. Such an interesting ... Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2018/06/10 Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'Español', 'Português', 'Français'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'Español', 'Français', 'Português'], 'Directors': ['Mark Schwahn'], 'Starring': ['Alexandra Park', 'Tom Austen', 'Elizabeth Hurley'], 'Studio': ['Lionsgate']} Review Text: Tv rubbish at its best!! & with an amazing sound track. Liz Hurley kills it and excellent casting all the way - including the Aussie actress who plays the princess. Her accent from down under peaks through from time to time - but she's so fun to watch.
Warning - addictive and binge worthy. Review Title: Tv rubbish at its best!! & with an amazing sound track Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2018/08/02 Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Mark Schwahn'], 'Producers': ['Mark Schwahn', 'Brian Robbins', 'Joe Davola', 'Shuana Phelan'], 'Starring': ['Alexandra Park', 'Vincent Regan', 'Merritt Patterson']} Review Text: The most entertaining, hilarious, eye-candy that will pull you in from the first moment. Hurley delivers an unexpected twist on the notion of the queen. Excellent casting all around. Review Title: Excellent casting all around Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2019/05/25 Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium', 'Español (España)', 'Italiano', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Polski', '日本語', 'Português', 'Deutsch', 'Français'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'العربية', 'Čeština', 'Dansk', 'Deutsch', 'Ελληνικά', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Español (España)', 'Suomi', 'Filipino', 'Français', 'עברית', 'हिन्दी', 'Magyar', 'Indonesia', 'Italiano', '日本語', '한국어', 'Bahasa Melayu', 'Norsk Bokmål', 'Nederlands', 'Polski', 'Português (Brasil)', 'Português (Portugal)', 'Română', 'Русский', 'Svenska', 'தமிழ்', 'తెలుగు', 'ไทย', 'Türkçe', 'Українська', 'Tiếng Việt', '中文（简体）', '中文（繁體）'], 'Directors': ['Steven Conrad'], 'Producers': ['Glenn Ficarra', 'John Requa', 'Jennifer Scher', 'Charles Gogolak', 'Christina Fitzgerald', 'Bruce Terris', 'Michael Nelson', 'Peter Moxley', 'James Parriott', 'Gil Bellows', 'Stephen Hoey'], 'Starring': ['Chris Conrad', 'Kurtwood Smith', 'Michael Dorman'], 'Studio': ['Amazon Studios']} Review Text: How is it that I just heard about this show? Its everything I want.
Its beautiful music, directing, and acting. All of the actors are perfection.
Its hard to describe - but its a Must watch. As someone who votes - I'm surprised it hasn't gotten more awards.
It doesn't have to rely on anything grotesque or sexually subversive to achieve its humor.
Dark comedy at its best. Review Title: Spectacular in Every Way! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2019/07/31 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Andy De Emmony', 'Sarah Harding', 'Jamie Payne'], 'Producers': ['Jake Lushington', 'Trevor Hopkins', 'Matthew Patnick', 'Greg Phillips', 'Geoff Webb', 'Christine Healy', 'Simon Heath']} Review Text: Absolutely brilliant! I love these women working together with their respective super powers. Its beautifully done and really a joy to watch. Its lovely to see strong female leads is such a compelling story. Season 1 is a bit scary - so be warned. That being said. -the acting, cinematography, and costume design are perfection. Enjoy! Review Title: Outstanding - We need more of this show! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2019/08/05 Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['David Frazee', 'Gary Harvey'], 'Starring': ['Julie Graham', 'Peter Benson', 'Rachael Stirling']} Review Text: I've watched all the seasons . While I do prefer the show when in London (seasons 1,2) - this season was also spectacular. I loved it. Fabulous all around. Review Title: spectacular show Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2020/05/17 Average Rating: 4.9 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Paul Gibson'], 'Starring': ['Mark Williams', 'Sorcha Cusack', 'Jack Deam'], 'Studio': ['BritBox']} Review Text: Another spectacular season. Of course, I missed Lady Felicia .. but Bunty is just such a great addition. I love her character. Many great episodes this season complete with strawberry scones- including a Flambeau finale. As an American - I just can't get enough of this show! I've seem most episodes at least twice. I wish they had French subtitles so I could try and improve my language skills and watch it a third time. Can't wait for season 8. Review Title: the truth will out :) Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2020/06/09 Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['David Caffrey'], 'Producers': ['Camilla Campbell', 'Rebecca Eaton', 'Chris Lahr', 'Rhonda Smith', 'Robert Wulff-Cochrane']} Review Text: Really? Do we actually need yet another P.O.S. show out there filled with violence and darkness. Actors are good- but I just don't need to put depressing images into my brain. When will people realize that (most) Television really is so depressing. Why create this content? Why watch it? After 1 episode , I am out. Review Title: Just another dark, violent show meant to instill fear Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Bruce Almighty Review Date: 2020/06/09 Categories: Comedy, Fantasy, Inspiring, Outrageous Product Description: ['A guy who complains about God too often is given almighty powers to teach him how difficult it is to run the world.'] Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Tom Shadyac'], 'Producers': ['Tom Shadyac', 'Jim Carrey', 'James D. Brubaker', 'Michael Bostick', 'Steve Koren', "Mark O'keefe"], 'Starring': ['Jim Carrey', 'Jennifer Aniston', 'Morgan Freeman']} Review Text: Fun, delightful... a good laugh. Enjoy. Review Title: Jim Carrey at his best. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2020/07/10 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Shaun Evans', 'Kate Saxon', 'Colm McCarthy', 'Geoffrey Sax', 'Andy Wilson', 'Edward Bazalgette', 'Tom Vaughan', 'Craig Viveiros', 'Giuseppe Capotondi', 'Kristoffer Nyholm'], 'Starring': ['Roger Allam', 'James Bradshaw']} Review Text: I love British crime dramas and period pieces. Therefore - this show is essentially the perfect combination. Shaun Evans is just so fascinating to watch - even in the season when he has a monstrous mustache. The characters, Fred Thursday and DI Strange are just so relatable and lovable. I just want to keep watching them.
The episodes always start of with a set of seeming random images.. and how they come together is just the right amount surprising. I can't wait to watch more. When will Amazon get season 7? And when will season 8 be released? For what its worth - I really liked the episode directed by the main actor himself... and can't wait for more of Ms. Thursday. Beautiful attention to detail with respect to costumes, set design and all things related to the era.... I would say on the level of "Once Upon A Time in Hollywood". Brilliant acting all around, and the bucolic setting of Oxford makes me long for a visit to the UK. Review Title: An Oxford Masterpiece Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2020/08/23 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Paul Gibson', 'Lol Fletcher'], 'Producers': ['Peter Bullock'], 'Starring': ['Mark Williams', 'Sorcha Cusack', 'Jack Deam'], 'Studio': ['BritBox']} Review Text: I really cannot express how much I adore this show . The main characters are just so charming ... I love that Ron Weasley's dad is a priest tracking down criminals. I also love that if you are watching closely - you can usually figure out a few of the clues. The final episode with all thee former detectives was epic. I loved it. .. a departure from the classic Flabeau finale. I have watched and rewatched all episodes in all 8 seasons .. and I can't wait for more. For what its worth - I'm a millennial in the US, and my friends and I find this show hilarious and wonderful. Review Title: Another spectacular season! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2020/12/29 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium', 'English Dialogue Boost: Low', 'Italiano', '日本語', 'Português', 'Deutsch', 'हिन्दी', 'Español (España)', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Polski', 'Čeština', 'Magyar', 'Türkçe', 'Français'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'العربية', 'Čeština', 'Dansk', 'Deutsch', 'Ελληνικά', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Español (España)', 'Suomi', 'Filipino', 'Français', 'עברית', 'हिन्दी', 'Magyar', 'Indonesia', 'Italiano', '日本語', '한국어', 'Bahasa Melayu', 'Norsk Bokmål', 'Nederlands', 'Polski', 'Português (Brasil)', 'Português (Portugal)', 'Română', 'Русский', 'Svenska', 'தமிழ்', 'తెలుగు', 'ไทย', 'Türkçe', 'Українська', 'Tiếng Việt', '中文（简体）', '中文（繁體）'], 'Directors': ['Scott Ellis'], 'Producers': ['Amy Sherman-Palladino', 'Daniel Palladino', 'Sheila Lawrence', 'Dhana Rivera Gilbert'], 'Starring': ['Alex Borstein', 'Marin Hinkle', 'Rachel Brosnahan'], 'Studio': ['Amazon Studios']} Review Text: What was so good about this show? Crude humor .. not that funny... I seem to recall liking the opulence or something .. but rewatching it - I'm not so impresses. Its great acting though... and lovely production. I just don't really feel inclined to put this in my brain. Review Title: Meh Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2021/12/14 Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Brad Turner', 'James Marshall', 'Jonathan Liebesman', 'Jesse Warn', 'Toa Fraser'], 'Producers': ['David Blocker', 'Kimberly Boyd', 'Terry Brooks', 'Dan Farah', 'Jon Favreau'], 'Studio': ['Paramount Network']} Review Text: I loved this fantasy world and all of the literally stunning actors.

Only wish there was more to see. I want to know what happens to the Druid when he doesn't take his marathon sleep. Review Title: FAB. Wish there were more seasons Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2017/06/05 Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Brian Kelly'], 'Starring': ['Caitríona Balfe', 'Sam Heughan', 'Gary Lewis'], 'Studio': ['starz_svod']} Review Text: Extremely (and I mean extremely) VIOLENT.

Such an interesting story. Why ruin it with such horror?

I just dont need those images in my brain. Review Title: Extremely (and I mean extremely) VIOLENT. Such an interesting ... Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2018/06/10 Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'Español', 'Português', 'Français'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'Español', 'Français', 'Português'], 'Directors': ['Mark Schwahn'], 'Starring': ['Alexandra Park', 'Tom Austen', 'Elizabeth Hurley'], 'Studio': ['Lionsgate']} Review Text: Tv rubbish at its best!! & with an amazing sound track. Liz Hurley kills it and excellent casting all the way - including the Aussie actress who plays the princess. Her accent from down under peaks through from time to time - but she's so fun to watch.
Warning - addictive and binge worthy. Review Title: Tv rubbish at its best!! & with an amazing sound track Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2018/08/02 Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Mark Schwahn'], 'Producers': ['Mark Schwahn', 'Brian Robbins', 'Joe Davola', 'Shuana Phelan'], 'Starring': ['Alexandra Park', 'Vincent Regan', 'Merritt Patterson']} Review Text: The most entertaining, hilarious, eye-candy that will pull you in from the first moment. Hurley delivers an unexpected twist on the notion of the queen. Excellent casting all around. Review Title: Excellent casting all around Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2019/05/25 Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium', 'Español (España)', 'Italiano', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Polski', '日本語', 'Português', 'Deutsch', 'Français'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'العربية', 'Čeština', 'Dansk', 'Deutsch', 'Ελληνικά', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Español (España)', 'Suomi', 'Filipino', 'Français', 'עברית', 'हिन्दी', 'Magyar', 'Indonesia', 'Italiano', '日本語', '한국어', 'Bahasa Melayu', 'Norsk Bokmål', 'Nederlands', 'Polski', 'Português (Brasil)', 'Português (Portugal)', 'Română', 'Русский', 'Svenska', 'தமிழ்', 'తెలుగు', 'ไทย', 'Türkçe', 'Українська', 'Tiếng Việt', '中文（简体）', '中文（繁體）'], 'Directors': ['Steven Conrad'], 'Producers': ['Glenn Ficarra', 'John Requa', 'Jennifer Scher', 'Charles Gogolak', 'Christina Fitzgerald', 'Bruce Terris', 'Michael Nelson', 'Peter Moxley', 'James Parriott', 'Gil Bellows', 'Stephen Hoey'], 'Starring': ['Chris Conrad', 'Kurtwood Smith', 'Michael Dorman'], 'Studio': ['Amazon Studios']} Review Text: How is it that I just heard about this show? Its everything I want.
Its beautiful music, directing, and acting. All of the actors are perfection.
Its hard to describe - but its a Must watch. As someone who votes - I'm surprised it hasn't gotten more awards.
It doesn't have to rely on anything grotesque or sexually subversive to achieve its humor.
Dark comedy at its best. Review Title: Spectacular in Every Way! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2019/07/31 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Andy De Emmony', 'Sarah Harding', 'Jamie Payne'], 'Producers': ['Jake Lushington', 'Trevor Hopkins', 'Matthew Patnick', 'Greg Phillips', 'Geoff Webb', 'Christine Healy', 'Simon Heath']} Review Text: Absolutely brilliant! I love these women working together with their respective super powers. Its beautifully done and really a joy to watch. Its lovely to see strong female leads is such a compelling story. Season 1 is a bit scary - so be warned. That being said. -the acting, cinematography, and costume design are perfection. Enjoy! Review Title: Outstanding - We need more of this show! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2019/08/05 Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['David Frazee', 'Gary Harvey'], 'Starring': ['Julie Graham', 'Peter Benson', 'Rachael Stirling']} Review Text: I've watched all the seasons . While I do prefer the show when in London (seasons 1,2) - this season was also spectacular. I loved it. Fabulous all around. Review Title: spectacular show Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2020/05/17 Average Rating: 4.9 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Paul Gibson'], 'Starring': ['Mark Williams', 'Sorcha Cusack', 'Jack Deam'], 'Studio': ['BritBox']} Review Text: Another spectacular season. Of course, I missed Lady Felicia .. but Bunty is just such a great addition. I love her character. Many great episodes this season complete with strawberry scones- including a Flambeau finale. As an American - I just can't get enough of this show! I've seem most episodes at least twice. I wish they had French subtitles so I could try and improve my language skills and watch it a third time. Can't wait for season 8. Review Title: the truth will out :) Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2020/06/09 Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['David Caffrey'], 'Producers': ['Camilla Campbell', 'Rebecca Eaton', 'Chris Lahr', 'Rhonda Smith', 'Robert Wulff-Cochrane']} Review Text: Really? Do we actually need yet another P.O.S. show out there filled with violence and darkness. Actors are good- but I just don't need to put depressing images into my brain. When will people realize that (most) Television really is so depressing. Why create this content? Why watch it? After 1 episode , I am out. Review Title: Just another dark, violent show meant to instill fear Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Bruce Almighty Review Date: 2020/06/09 Categories: Comedy, Fantasy, Inspiring, Outrageous Product Description: ['A guy who complains about God too often is given almighty powers to teach him how difficult it is to run the world.'] Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Tom Shadyac'], 'Producers': ['Tom Shadyac', 'Jim Carrey', 'James D. Brubaker', 'Michael Bostick', 'Steve Koren', "Mark O'keefe"], 'Starring': ['Jim Carrey', 'Jennifer Aniston', 'Morgan Freeman']} Review Text: Fun, delightful... a good laugh. Enjoy. Review Title: Jim Carrey at his best. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2020/07/10 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Shaun Evans', 'Kate Saxon', 'Colm McCarthy', 'Geoffrey Sax', 'Andy Wilson', 'Edward Bazalgette', 'Tom Vaughan', 'Craig Viveiros', 'Giuseppe Capotondi', 'Kristoffer Nyholm'], 'Starring': ['Roger Allam', 'James Bradshaw']} Review Text: I love British crime dramas and period pieces. Therefore - this show is essentially the perfect combination. Shaun Evans is just so fascinating to watch - even in the season when he has a monstrous mustache. The characters, Fred Thursday and DI Strange are just so relatable and lovable. I just want to keep watching them.
The episodes always start of with a set of seeming random images.. and how they come together is just the right amount surprising. I can't wait to watch more. When will Amazon get season 7? And when will season 8 be released? For what its worth - I really liked the episode directed by the main actor himself... and can't wait for more of Ms. Thursday. Beautiful attention to detail with respect to costumes, set design and all things related to the era.... I would say on the level of "Once Upon A Time in Hollywood". Brilliant acting all around, and the bucolic setting of Oxford makes me long for a visit to the UK. Review Title: An Oxford Masterpiece Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2020/08/23 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Paul Gibson', 'Lol Fletcher'], 'Producers': ['Peter Bullock'], 'Starring': ['Mark Williams', 'Sorcha Cusack', 'Jack Deam'], 'Studio': ['BritBox']} Review Text: I really cannot express how much I adore this show . The main characters are just so charming ... I love that Ron Weasley's dad is a priest tracking down criminals. I also love that if you are watching closely - you can usually figure out a few of the clues. The final episode with all thee former detectives was epic. I loved it. .. a departure from the classic Flabeau finale. I have watched and rewatched all episodes in all 8 seasons .. and I can't wait for more. For what its worth - I'm a millennial in the US, and my friends and I find this show hilarious and wonderful. Review Title: Another spectacular season! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2020/12/29 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium', 'English Dialogue Boost: Low', 'Italiano', '日本語', 'Português', 'Deutsch', 'हिन्दी', 'Español (España)', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Polski', 'Čeština', 'Magyar', 'Türkçe', 'Français'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'العربية', 'Čeština', 'Dansk', 'Deutsch', 'Ελληνικά', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Español (España)', 'Suomi', 'Filipino', 'Français', 'עברית', 'हिन्दी', 'Magyar', 'Indonesia', 'Italiano', '日本語', '한국어', 'Bahasa Melayu', 'Norsk Bokmål', 'Nederlands', 'Polski', 'Português (Brasil)', 'Português (Portugal)', 'Română', 'Русский', 'Svenska', 'தமிழ்', 'తెలుగు', 'ไทย', 'Türkçe', 'Українська', 'Tiếng Việt', '中文（简体）', '中文（繁體）'], 'Directors': ['Scott Ellis'], 'Producers': ['Amy Sherman-Palladino', 'Daniel Palladino', 'Sheila Lawrence', 'Dhana Rivera Gilbert'], 'Starring': ['Alex Borstein', 'Marin Hinkle', 'Rachel Brosnahan'], 'Studio': ['Amazon Studios']} Review Text: What was so good about this show? Crude humor .. not that funny... I seem to recall liking the opulence or something .. but rewatching it - I'm not so impresses. Its great acting though... and lovely production. I just don't really feel inclined to put this in my brain. Review Title: Meh Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2021/12/14 Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Brad Turner', 'James Marshall', 'Jonathan Liebesman', 'Jesse Warn', 'Toa Fraser'], 'Producers': ['David Blocker', 'Kimberly Boyd', 'Terry Brooks', 'Dan Farah', 'Jon Favreau'], 'Studio': ['Paramount Network']} Review Text: I loved this fantasy world and all of the literally stunning actors.

Only wish there was more to see. I want to know what happens to the Druid when he doesn't take his marathon sleep. Review Title: FAB. Wish there were more seasons Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

**Shopping Preferences Summary**

- **Genres:** A strong preference for *comedy*, *fantasy*, and *dark comedy* reflects a desire for uplifting or entertaining content, often featuring strong narratives and humor.
  
- **Format & Media:** A mix of *VHS* and *digital* formats indicates nostalgia for classic media while embracing modern viewing methods. A focus on *streaming platforms* like Amazon Studios and BritBox reveals a preference for accessible, high-quality productions.

- **Themes:** Frequent mention of *girl power*, *strong female leads*, and *empowerment* highlights an appreciation for narratives that celebrate women and celebrate their strength.

- **Content Preferences:** A clash between enjoyment of shows with comedic elements and a rejection of *dark or violent* themes suggests a need for lighthearted content devoid of excessive negativity or graphic violence.

- **Actors & Actresses:** An affinity for well-known actors and strong performances showcases a desire for established talent, enhancing viewing experiences.

- **Ratings & Reviews:** Consistently high ratings for favored content signify a discerning taste; however, negativity towards *excessive violence* and *crude humor* indicates a request for thoughtfully crafted stories rather than sensationalist entertainment.

- **Viewing Behavior:** An affinity for rewatching favorite series suggests a strong attachment to beloved narratives, while occasional pangs of disappointment signal high expectations for new content based on prior experiences.

Overall, this consumer prioritizes engaging, female-centric narratives, high production quality, and lighthearted, humorous content.

target_interaction.title: Swept Away into Tolkien
target_interaction.text:
Visually Stunning and the characters are lovely.

As a huge Tolkien fan who literally bought my copy of the Silmarillion at the Book Store in the Shire in New Zealand - it would have been nice to see Peter Jackson direct this story.

Nonetheless - I love it!! Can't wait to see how the story unfolds through the season.
